name: machine-learning-assistant
description: Machine learning plugin with agents for ML fundamentals, deep learning, and model deployment
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a learning path and get recommendations based on your goals

commands.name: explore
commands.description: Explore all available agents and their specialized areas

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Find and analyze specific developer roadmaps

commands.name: skills
commands.description: Browse and discover available skills by agent and category

commands.name: trending
commands.description: Discover trending technologies and skills to learn next

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Browse real-world projects organized by difficulty and topic

commands.name: compare
commands.description: Compare different technologies, frameworks, and approaches
